name: Bunny Boomers
description:
Bunny Boomers is a an action-arcade game where you need to disarm all mines in the level. Watch out! Your bunny friends are wandering around the field and they might accidentally land on a mine! Disable all the mines as fast as you can, and if you need to keep the bunnies occupied, pluck out a carrot and place it in front of them.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021.

Credits:

Andre - Game Development / Programming Amy - Game Development / Programming David - Illustrator / 3D Artist Eduardo - Producer / Mock ups Marcus - SFX / Programming Naum - Game Development / Programming Tom - Game Development / Programming

Game Engine : Unreal Engine 4.26
